title: mystery skin box purchseing bug
body: i ve purchased mystery skin box, and i could see all the skins i ve got, such as unmasked kayle, red riding annie, ruthless pantheon, vandal vladimir, but it was not showing in the champion page. it happend yesterday, i tried many times today and on other computer, still not working. bugged?

replies.body:
Hey SugarHi,

Thanks for the report! We're currently in the process of investigating the issue. ^-^
